text: 32:35 Ofa Gami 18:21; 2 Atriviba 23:10; Jeremaia 7:31Egha me Hinomɨn danganir zarimɨn asem Balɨn ziam fasa danganim akɨri. Egha me uari uan boriba isɨ asem Molekɨn ofa damuasa. Kɨ kamaghɨn damuasa me mɨkemezir puvatɨ. Ezɨ kɨ uaghan arazir kam me danɨngasa nɨghnɨzir pu. Bar puvatɨ. Me arazir bar kurar kurizir kam damuan kɨ ifongezir puvatɨ. Me kamaghɨram amua Judabar naviba fezɨ, me arazir kurar kamɨn osɨmtɨzim iti.”
